Chicopee.United States Post Office\u2013Holyoke M: The US Post Office—Holyoke Main is a historic post office building at 650 Dwight Street in Holyoke, Massachusetts. It opened in 1935, as a replacement for an earlier post office location at 31 Main Street. The Art Deco building, a stylistic rarity in Holyoke, was built for a total cost (including land and construction) of $284,000.
